API Demo

输入 

options = {
    url: 'http://127.0.0.1/apply/testApi',
    id:'xxxxxx',
    token:'xxx',
    user:'xxx'
}

输出 

如:http://127.0.0.1/apply/testApi?id=1550201309061&token=zwSb0hdIJof3WijjLb/sPtO7s4&user=zhoujie
返回:
{
    'success': true,
    'data': {
      'username': 'test',
      'password': '123456',
      'user': 'zhoujie'
    }
}
